title: Hubli
summary: Hubli, officially known as Hubballi, is a City in the Indian state of Karnataka. The twin cities Hubliâ€“Dharwad form the second largest city in the state by size and population and the largest city in North Karnataka.[3] Hubli is located in Dharwad district of Karnataka and is the taluk headquarters of Hubli City and Hubli Rural. Although it hosts the HDMC office, the district headquarters is located in Dharwad.[4]
